description.p: Evolution is a personal information management application that provides integrated mail, calendaring and address book functionality.

Evolution supports a wide range of industry standard data formats and network protocols for information exchange, with an emphasis on standards compliance and security. Evolution can also integrate smoothly with Microsoft Exchange by way of the тАЬExchange Web ServicesтАЭ (EWS) extension.

Evolution ржПржЯрж╛ ржмрзНржпржХрзНрждрж┐ржЧржд рждржерзНржп ржмрзНржпрз▒рж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржирж╛ ржПржкрзНрж▓рж┐ржХрзЗржЪржи ржпрж┐ ржЕржирзБржХрзВрж▓рж┐ржд ржорзЗржЗрж▓, ржХрзЗрж▓рзЗржирзНржбрж╛рз░рж┐ржВ ржЖрз░рзБ ржарж┐ржХржирж╛ ржмрж╣рзАрз░ ржХрж╛рз░рзНржпрзНржпржХрз░рж┐рждрж╛ ржкрзНрз░ржжрж╛ржи ржХрз░рзЗред
Evolution je li─Нna aplikacija za upravljanje informacijama koja pru┼╛a usluge ingeriranih po┼бtanskih poruka, kalendara i adresara.
L'Evolution ├йs una aplicaci├│ de gesti├│ d'informaci├│ personal que proporciona funcions integrades de correu, de calendari i de llibreta d'adreces.

L'Evolution ├йs compatible amb un gran ventall de formats est├аndard de dades i de protocols de xarxa per a l'intercanvi d'informaci├│, amb un ├иmfasi en el compliment d'est├аndards i de seguretat. L'Evolution tamb├й pot integrar-se sense problemes amb el Microsoft Exchange amb l'extensi├│ ┬лServeis web de l'Exchange┬╗ (EWS).
L'Evolution ├йs una aplicaci├│ de gesti├│ d'informaci├│ personal que proporciona funcions integrades de correu, de calendari i de llibreta d'adreces.

L'Evolution ├йs compatible amb un gran ventall de formats est├аndard de dades i de protocols de xarxa per a l'intercanvi d'informaci├│, amb un ├иmfasi en el compliment d'est├аndards i de seguretat. L'Evolution tamb├й pot integrar-se sense problemes amb el Microsoft Exchange amb l'extensi├│ ┬лExchange Web Services┬╗ (EWS).
Evolution je aplikace slou┼╛├нc├н ke spr├бv─Ы osobn├нch informac├н. Pro tento ├║─Нel poskytuje integrovan├╜ e-mail, kalend├б┼Щ a adres├б┼Щ.

Evolution podporuje ┼бirokou ┼бk├бlu datov├╜ch form├бt┼п a s├н┼еov├╜ch protokol┼п slou┼╛├нc├нch k v├╜m─Ыn─Ы informac├н, v┼бe s d┼пrazem na dodr┼╛ov├бn├н standard┼п a bezpe─Нnost. Lze jej tak├й hladce integrovat s Microsoft Exchange pomoc├н roz┼б├н┼Щen├н EWS (Exchange Web Service).
Evolution er et program til h├еndtering af personlig information, som indeholder integreret funktionalitet til e-mails, kalender og adresseb├╕ger.

Evolution underst├╕tter en bred vifte af industristandardiserede dataformater og netv├жrksprotokoller til informationsudveksling, med fokus p├е overensstemmelse med standarderne og sikkerhed. Evolution kan ogs├е p├е nem vis integreres med Microsoft Exchange ved hj├жlp at тАЬExchange Web ServicesтАЭ-udvidelsen (EWS).
Evolution ist eine Anwendung zur Verwaltung pers├╢nlicher Informationen, die ein E-Mail-Programm, einen Kalender und ein Adressbuch enth├дlt.

Evolution unterst├╝tzt eine Vielzahl von industriellen Standard-Formaten und Netzwerk-Protokollen zum Informationsaustausch, mit einem Schwerpunkt auf Standard-Konformit├дt und Sicherheit. Evolution arbeitet au├Яerdem problemlos mit Microsoft Exchange mittels der Erweiterung ┬╗Exchange Web Services┬л (EWS) zusammen.
Evolution is a personal information management application that provides integrated mail, calendaring and address book functionality.

Evolution supports a wide range of industry standard data formats and network protocols for information exchange, with an emphasis on standards compliance and security. Evolution can also integrate smoothly with Microsoft Exchange by way of the тАЬExchange Web ServicesтАЭ (EWS) extension.
Evolucio estas perona informomastruma aplika─╡o, kiu provizas integritan po┼Эtan, kalendaran kaj adresaran funkciado.

Evolucio subtenas lar─Эan amplekson da industriaj normoj kaj retaj protokoloj por inter┼Эan─Эo de informoj, kun emfazo je konformo al normoj kaj sekureco. Evolucio anka┼н povas integri glate kun Microsoft Exchange tra la тАЬExchange Web ServicesтАЭ (EWS) etenda─╡o.
Evolution es una aplicacio╠Бn de gestio╠Бn de informacio╠Бn personal que integra funcionalidades de correo, calendario y libreta de direcciones.

Evolution soporta un amplio rango de esta╠Бndares industriales de formatos de datos y protocolos de red para intercambiar informacio╠Бn, haciendo hincapie╠Б en el cumplimiento de esta╠Бndares y de seguridad. Evolution tambie╠Бn se puede integrar con Microsoft Exchange usando la extensio╠Бn ┬лExchange Web Services┬╗ (EWS).
Evolution informazio pertsonala kudeatzeko aplikazio bat da, bateratutako posta elektronikoa, egutegia eta helbide-liburuaren funtzionalitatea eskaintzen du.

Evolution-ek industriaren datu-formatuen eta sareko protokoloen barruti handia onartzen du informazioa trukatzeko, eta bereziki estandarrak eta segurtasuna betetzen du. Evolution-ek Microsoft Exchange-rekin ere bateratzen da тАЬExchange Web ServicesтАЭ (EWS) hedapenaren bidez.

Evolution supports a wide range of industry standard data formats and network protocols for information exchange, with an emphasis on standards compliance and security. Evolution can also integrate smoothly with Microsoft Exchange by way of the тАЬExchange Web ServicesтАЭ (EWS) extension.

Evolution mendukung protokol jaringan dan format data standar industri yang luas untuk pertukaran informasi, dengan penekanan pada keamanan dan kepatuhan standar. Evolution juga dapat mengintegrasi secara mulus dengan Microsoft Exchange melalui ekstensi "Exchange Web Services" (EWS).

M!109 - EShell: Use symbolic icons on GNOME (C├йdric Bellegarde)

description.p: Miscellaneous:

ul.li: EMailStripSigFilter: Make sure it doesn't read out of buffer bounds

description.p: Translations:

ul.li: Christian Kirbach (de)

description.p: Bug Fixes:

ul.li: I#1871 - WebKitEditor: Convert to plain text incorrect on reply/forward open
I#1886 - itip-formatter: Use whole URL value as a link href
I#1891 - Fails to build with libgweather 3.36
I#1895 - Misc: Handle numpad Enter similarly as the Enter key
I#1896 - Composer: Ensure URL entry is focused in Link Properties
I#1898 - Better handle Dark Style GNOME 42 setting
I#1900 - iTIP formatter shows twice "Attendee status updated"
I#1902 - Tasks: Overdue calculation sometimes incorrect
I#1904 - CompEditor: Move whole component between calendars
I#1905 - DUE-today color in Tasks window not always applied
I#1913 - Calendar: iTip message not sent to a Room address
ews-I#159 - EMFolderTreeModel: Prefer Inbox over other folder types

description.p: Miscellaneous:

ul.li: EShell: Auto-close ESource connection alerts on idle
EContactEditor: Use a GWeakRef on the editor when opening target client
EWebDAVConfigLookup: Set also authentication method
EWebKitEditor: Mode change not propagated into the Editor widget
Tasks: Ensure ICalTime::zone is set for current time
itip-view: Ignore empty text/plain subpart in meeting invitation mail

description.p: Bug Fixes:

ul.li: I#1568 - Cannot import PKCS12 certificate with non-ASCII or empty password
I#1811 - icons: emblem-new hard to spot with adwaita-icon-theme 42
I#1827 - itip-formatter: Properly update content on message preview reload
I#1835 - Mail: Preview uses wrong colors for HTML mail with dark theme
I#1837 - Meeting attendees should default to Required Participants
I#1847 - attachment-reminder: Existing keyword lost on editing cancel
I#1849 - markdown-utils: Ignore character encoding hints in HTML when converting to text
I#1850 - Flatpak: Attachments cannot be opened
I#1853 - Tasks: Cannot remove recurrence and Start date at the same time
I#1857 - Composer: Markdown should preserve soft line breaks
I#1858 - Calendar: Show recurring information near event time in preview/iTip
I#1870 - Show mailto: hyperlinks in the status bar percent-decoded

description.p: Miscellaneous:

ul.li: Calendar: Minicalendar shown after search in the List View
gal-view-instance: Do not crash on broken setup
Disable hardware acceleration for WebKitGTK
